name: Link Track 2
description:
1. “Link Track 2” is a sequel to “Link Track”, which continues and expands the puzzle solving mechanism.
2. All the puzzles will be presented in a three-dimensional space, and you need to solve the puzzles by coloring manner.
3. Two game modes: Color Link mode and Number Track mode.
4. Color Link: Color the cell blocks between the two same color endpoints, so that the two endpoints are linked by the colored cell blocks.
5. Number Track: In the four direction around the node, look for the cell blocks that need to be colored, so that the number of the colored cell blocks is equal to the number on the node.
6. Play your space imagination, and open a fun and colorful puzzle tour!
